alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 11:52PM CDT until May 07 at 1:42AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, severe flooding affects pasturelands, oil fields, and county roads between Sapulpa and Jenks. Barns and oil field storage tanks may be flooded. Suburban homes will have water in yards. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:19 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
